import React, {useState, useEffect, Component} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import Navbar from '../components/Navbar' import Sidebar from '../components/Sidebar' const NewCourse = (props) => { const [languageState, setLanguageState] = useState([]) const [state, setState] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:4000/languages`) .then(response => setLanguageState(response.data)) .catch(error => console.log(error)) }, [state]) return (
{/*
COURSES
NEW COURSE

Course Creator

Select an activity type
Option 1
Option 2
Select a task type
Option 1
Option 2
*/}
) } export default NewCourse;
